Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by Detroit in 1982...
Injured on 7/12/1982 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/13/1986, off Mike Caldwell (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1986, off Chris Welsh (BOS)...
Injured on 7/27/1991 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 9/7/1991 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/23/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $720,000 per year...
Injured on 4/20/1992 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
